attr.attrdef: Denotes the PWD system the feature is part of.
The operational status of the facility.
Name of the owner of the facility.
Code denoting the type of facility represented. Differentiates features based on their connectivity rules.
Unique identifier used for hydraulic modeling
An identifier for the asset that allows searching through a specific feature class. It is comprised of the feature class id and sequential number. This is not a unique value.
